Message:
The angels of old
lose their power,
their seals broken,
allowing for the advent
of the demon lord.

My body, reshaped
by the 10 Curses,
becoming his vessel.

But, demons are
inherently cunning,
and arrogant all the same.

The 10 seals
have been broken,
leaving the 11th
inside me.

It was a miracle
that shouldn’t exist—
the result of demons’
schemes and angels’
deception.

I wield the power of God,
and can perform
His miracle only once.

That power was for
this very moment.
